Blanket.name: 毯子
Blanket.description: 包裹在毯子中期间，你在抵抗极寒的豁免检定上具有优势（详见地下城主指南）。

Water (Pint).name: 水（品脱）
Water (Pint).description: 如果你没有喝足够的水，你就有风险陷入 &Reference[dehydration] 状态。

Tinderbox.name: 火绒盒
Tinderbox.description: 火绒盒是一种装有打火石、火镰和火绒（通常是浸泡在燃油里的干布料）的小型容器，其中的物品可以用来点火。你可以使用附赠动作来用它点燃任何具有燃料的东西——例如蜡烛、油灯或火把。在没有燃料的情况下生火需要 1 分钟时间。

Rope.name: 绳索
Rope.description:
以一个利用动作，你可以进行一次DC 10 的敏捷（巧手）检定。如果该检定成功，你能用绳索打一个结。扯坏绳索需要通过一次DC 20 的力量（运动）检定。

你可以利用绳索捆住一个非自愿生物，但该生物必须处于 &Reference[Grappled], &Reference[Incapacitated], 或 &Reference[Restrained] 状态。如果你绑住了该生物的腿，该生物陷入束缚状态，直至挣脱。挣脱绳索需要该生物使用动作来通过一次DC 15 的敏捷（特技）检定。

Waterskin.name: 水袋
Waterskin.description: 水袋具有 4 品脱容量。如果你喝水不足，你会遭受 &Reference[dehydration] 的危害（见规则详述）。

Rations.name: 口粮
Rations.description: 口粮由适合长途旅行携带的食物组成，包含肉干、风干水果、饼干和坚果等。不进食的危害详见术语汇编中的 &Reference[Malnutrition] 部分。

Map or Scroll Case.name: 地图或卷轴匣
Map or Scroll Case.description: 一个地图或卷轴匣至多能存放 10 张纸张或 5 张羊皮纸。

Oil.name: 燃油
Oil.description:
你能将燃油泼在一个生物、物件或一处空间上，你也可以将燃油作为燃料使用。具体使用方法如下。

泼洒一个生物或一个物件 Dousing a Creature or an Object。 当你执行攻击动作时，你可以将你的一次攻击替换为丢出一扁瓶燃油。你可以选择位于你20尺内可见的一个生物或物件作为目标。该目标必须通过一次敏捷豁免（DC等于 8 + 你的敏捷调整值 + 你的熟练加值），失败则被燃油覆盖。如果目标在燃油挥发前（1 分钟后）受到任何火焰伤害，则目标因燃烧的燃油受到额外[[/damage 5 type=fire]]伤害。

泼洒一处空间 Dousing a Space。 以一个利用动作，你可以将一扁瓶燃油泼在地面上，以覆盖一块边长 5 尺且保持水平的方形区域。点燃后，从点燃时算起，燃油会持续燃烧两轮并在回合结束时熄灭（或 12 秒）。点燃时，任何进入该区域或在该区域结束其回合的生物都会受到 5 点火焰伤害。同一生物每回合只受该伤害作用一次。

燃料 Fuel。 燃油能作为油灯和提灯的燃料使用。一旦点着，一扁瓶的燃油可以在油灯和提灯中持续燃烧 6 小时。持续时长并不需要是连续的，你可以熄灭点着的燃油（以一个利用动作），并在之后再点燃，直到总共燃烧了 6 小时。

Bedroll.name: 铺盖
Bedroll.description: 一卷铺盖能睡下一个小型或中型生物。躺在铺盖中时，你自动通过抵抗极寒的豁免检定（详见地下城主指南）。

Parchment.name: 羊皮纸
Parchment.description: 一页羊皮纸能够写满 250 个手写单词。

Hooded Lantern.name: 附盖提灯
Hooded Lantern.description: 一盏附盖提灯使用燃油作为燃料，点着时能够发出 30 尺半径的明亮光照和额外 30 尺的微光光照。以一个附赠动作，你可以盖上或掀开提灯的盖子。盖上盖子时，提灯的光亮降至半径 5 尺的微光光照。

Lamp.name: 油灯
Lamp.description: 一盏油灯使用 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000] 作为燃料，点着时能够发出 15 尺半径的明亮光照和额外 30 尺的微光光照。

Bell.name: 铃铛
Bell.description: 以一个利用动作，你可以摇响一个铃铛，铃铛会发出 60 尺内都能够听到的声音。

Bullseye Lantern.name: 牛眼提灯
Bullseye Lantern.description: 一盏油灯使用燃油作为燃料，点着时能够发出 60 尺远锥形的明亮光照和额外 60 尺远的微光光照。

Ball Bearings.name: 滚珠
Ball Bearings.description:
以一个利用动作，你能把一小包滚珠撒至地面，并覆盖你周围 10 尺内的一处 10 尺方形区域。任何生物每回合首次进入这片区域时都必须通过一次DC 10 的敏捷豁免，否则将陷入 &Reference[Prone] 状态。重新收集这些滚珠需要花费 10 分钟时间。

Foundry Note

The “回收滚珠”行动可让该物品再使用一次。

Torch.name: Torch
Torch.description: A Torch burns for 1 hour, casting Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. When you take the Attack action, you can attack with the Torch, using it as a Simple Melee weapon. On a hit, the target takes 1 Fire damage.

Crowbar.name: Crowbar
Crowbar.description: Using a Crowbar gives you Advantage on Strength checks where the Crowbar’s leverage can be applied.

Mirror.name: Mirror
Mirror.description: A handheld steel Mirror is useful for personal cosmetics but also for peeking around corners and reflecting light as a signal.

Ink.name: Ink
Ink.description: Ink comes in a 1-ounce bottle, which provides enough ink to write about 500 pages.

Caltrops.name: Caltrops
Caltrops.description: As a Utilize action, you can spread Caltrops from their bag to cover a 5-foot-square area within 5 feet of yourself. A creature that enters this area for the first time on a turn must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 1 Piercing damage and have its Speed reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn. It takes 10 minutes to recover the Caltrops.

Robe.name: Robe
Robe.description: A Robe has vocational or ceremonial significance. Some events and locations admit only people wearing a Robe bearing certain colors or symbols.

Holy Water.name: Holy Water
Holy Water.description: When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with throwing a flask of Holy Water. Target one creature you can see within 20 feet of yourself. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 plus your Dexterity modifier and Proficiency Bonus) or take 2d8 Radiant damage if it is a Fiend or an Undead.

Costume.name: Costume
Costume.description: While wearing a Costume, you have Advantage on any ability check you make to impersonate the person or type of person it represents.

Ebony-bound Atlas.name: Ebony-bound Atlas
Ebony-bound Atlas.description: A collection of maps bound in an ebony cover that can be used as a Spellcasting Focus by Circle of the Star Druids. It is a Tiny object.

Engraved Crystal.name: Engraved Crystal
Engraved Crystal.description: A crystal engraved with starry patterns that can be used as a Spellcasting Focus by Circle of the Star Druids. It is a Tiny object.

Etched Glass Disk.name: Etched Glass Disk
Etched Glass Disk.description: A glass disk etched with constellations that can be used as a Spellcasting Focus by Circle of the Star Druids. It is a Tiny object.

Tooled Owlbear Hide.name: Tooled Owlbear Hide
Tooled Owlbear Hide.description: An owlbear hide tooled with stellar symbols that can be used as a Spellcasting Focus by Circle of the Star Druids. It is a Tiny object.

Constellations Scroll.name: Constellations Scroll
Constellations Scroll.description: A scroll bearing depictions of constellations that can be used as a Spellcasting Focus by Circle of the Star Druids. It is a Tiny object.

Stone Tablet.name: Stone Tablet
Stone Tablet.description: A stone tablet with fine holes drilled through it that can be used as a Spellcasting Focus by Circle of the Star Druids. It is a Tiny object.

Crystal.name: Crystal
Crystal.description: An @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{Arcane Focus} is bejeweled or carved to channel arcane magic. A Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard can use such an item as a Spellcasting Focus.

Orb.name: Orb
Orb.description: An @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{Arcane Focus} is bejeweled or carved to channel arcane magic. A Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard can use such an item as a Spellcasting Focus.

Rod.name: Rod
Rod.description: An @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{Arcane Focus} is bejeweled or carved to channel arcane magic. A Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard can use such an item as a Spellcasting Focus.

Staff.name: Staff
Staff.description:
An @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{Arcane Focus} is bejeweled or carved to channel arcane magic. A Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard can use such an item as a Spellcasting Focus.

This item also functions as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepQuartersta]{Quarterstaff}

Foundry Note

This item has been configured with the additional properties of a Quarterstaff.

Wand.name: Wand
Wand.description: An @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{Arcane Focus} is bejeweled or carved to channel arcane magic. A Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard can use such an item as a Spellcasting Focus.

Acid.name: Acid
Acid.description: When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with throwing a vial of Acid. Target one creature or object you can see within 20 feet of yourself. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 plus your Dexterity modifier and Proficiency Bonus) or take 2d6 Acid damage.

Alchemist's Fire.name: Alchemist's Fire
Alchemist's Fire.description: When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with throwing a flask of Alchemist’s Fire. Target one creature or object you can see within 20 feet of yourself. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 plus your Dexterity modifier and Proficiency Bonus) or take 1d4 Fire damage and start burning (see the rules glossary).

Ammunition (Varies).name: Ammunition (Varies)
Ammunition (Varies).description:
Ammunition is required by a weapon that has the Ammunition property. A weapon’s description specifies the type of ammunition used by the weapon. The Ammunition table lists the different types and the amount you get when you buy them. The table also lists the item that is typically used to store each type; storage must be bought separately.

Ammunition
TypeAmountStorageWeightCost
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbamoArrows0000]{Arrows}20@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagQuiver00000]{Quiver}1 lb.1 GP
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbamoBolts00000]{Bolts}20@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCaseCrossbo]{Case}1½ lb.1 GP
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbamoBulletsFir]{Bullets, Firearm}10@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPouch000000]{Pouch}2 lb.3 GP
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbamoBulletsSli]{Bullets, Sling}20@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPouch000000]{Pouch}1½ lb.4 CP
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbamoNeedles000]{Needles}50@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPouch000000]{Pouch}1 lb.1 GP

Antitoxin.name: Antitoxin
Antitoxin.description: As a Bonus Action, you can drink a vial of Antitoxin to gain Advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the Poisoned condition for 1 hour.

Arcane Focus (Varies).name: Arcane Focus (Varies)
Arcane Focus (Varies).description:
An Arcane Focus takes one of the forms in the Arcane Focuses table and is bejeweled or carved to channel arcane magic. A Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard can use such an item as a Spellcasting Focus.

Arcane Focuses
FocusWeightCost
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcCrystal000]{Crystal}1 lb.10 GP
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcOrb0000000]{Orb}3 lb.20 GP
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcRod0000000]{Rod}2 lb.10 GP
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcStaffalsoa]{Staff} (also a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepQuartersta]{Quarterstaff})4 lb.5 GP
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcWand000000]{Wand}1 lb.10 GP

Backpack.name: Backpack
Backpack.description: A Backpack holds up to 30 pounds within 1 cubic foot. It can also serve as a saddlebag.

Barrel.name: Barrel
Barrel.description: A Barrel holds up to 40 gallons of liquid or up to 4 cubic feet of dry goods.

Basket.name: Basket
Basket.description: A Basket holds up to 40 pounds within 2 cubic feet.

Block and Tackle.name: Block and Tackle
Block and Tackle.description: A Block and Tackle allows you to hoist up to four times the weight you can normally lift.

Book.name: Book
Book.description: A Book contains fiction or nonfiction. If you consult an accurate nonfiction Book about its topic, you gain a +5 bonus to Intelligence (Arcana, History, Nature, or Religion) checks you make about that topic.

Bottle, Glass.name: Bottle, Glass
Bottle, Glass.description: A Glass Bottle holds up to 1½ pints.

Bucket.name: Bucket
Bucket.description: A Bucket holds up to half a cubic foot of contents.

Burglar's Pack.name: Burglar's Pack
Burglar's Pack.description: A Burglar’s Pack contains the following items: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBackpack000]{Backpack}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBallBearing]{Ball Bearings}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBell0000000]{Bell}, 10 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCandle00000]{Candles}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCrowbar0000]{Crowbar}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.wjHtGnd05SPdURqE]{Hooded Lantern}, 7 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000]{flasks of Oil}, 5 days of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRations0000]{Rations}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRope0000000]{Rope}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00]{Tinderbox}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagWaterskin00]{Waterskin}.

Candle.name: Candle
Candle.description: For 1 hour, a lit Candle sheds Bright Light in a 5-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 5 feet.

Spell Scroll, Cantrip.name: Spell Scroll, Cantrip
Spell Scroll, Cantrip.description:
A Spell Scroll (Cantrip) or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagSpellScroll]{Spell Scroll (Level 1)} is a magic item that bears the words of a cantrip or level 1 spell, respectively, determined by the scroll’s creator. If the spell is on your class’s spell list, you can read the scroll and cast the spell using its normal casting time and without providing any Material components.

If the spell requires a saving throw or an attack roll, the spell save DC is 13, and the attack bonus is +5. The scroll disintegrates when the casting is completed.

Case, Crossbow Bolt.name: Case, Crossbow Bolt
Case, Crossbow Bolt.description: A Crossbow Bolt Case holds up to 20 Bolts.

Case, Map or Scroll.name: Case, Map or Scroll
Case, Map or Scroll.description: A Map or Scroll Case holds up to 10 sheets of paper or 5 sheets of parchment.

Chain.name: Chain
Chain.description: As a Utilize action, you can wrap a Chain around an unwilling creature within 5 feet of yourself that has the &Reference[Grappled], &Reference[Incapacitated], or &Reference[Restrained] condition if you succeed on a DC 13 Strength (Athletics) check. If the creature’s legs are bound, the creature has the Restrained condition until it escapes. Escaping the Chain requires the creature to make a successful DC 18 Dexterity (Acrobatics) check as an action. Bursting the Chain requires a successful DC 20 Strength (Athletics) check as an action.

Chest.name: Chest
Chest.description: A Chest holds up to 12 cubic feet of contents.

Climber's Kit.name: Climber's Kit
Climber's Kit.description: A Climber’s Kit includes boot tips, gloves, pitons, and a harness. As a Utilize action, you can use the Climber’s Kit to anchor yourself; when you do, you can’t fall more than 25 feet from the anchor point, and you can’t move more than 25 feet from there without undoing the anchor as a Bonus Action.

Clothes, Fine.name: Clothes, Fine
Clothes, Fine.description: Fine Clothes are made of expensive fabrics and adorned with expertly crafted details. Some events and locations admit only people wearing these clothes.

Clothes, Traveler's.name: Clothes, Traveler's
Clothes, Traveler's.description: Traveler’s Clothes are resilient garments designed for travel in various environments.

Component Pouch.name: Component Pouch
Component Pouch.description: A Component Pouch is watertight and filled with compartments that hold all the free Material components of your spells.

Diplomat's Pack.name: Diplomat's Pack
Diplomat's Pack.description: A Diplomat’s Pack contains the following items: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagChest000000]{Chest}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.FqFmdzIBUSxFKKfi]{Fine Clothes}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagInk00000000]{Ink}, 5 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagInkPen00000]{Ink Pens}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagLamp0000000]{Lamp}, 2 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.5mIeX824uMklU3xq]{Map or Scroll Cases}, 4 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000]{flasks of Oil}, 5 sheets of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPaper000000]{Paper}, 5 sheets of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagParchment00]{Parchment}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPerfume0000]{Perfume}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00]{Tinderbox}.

Druidic Focus (Varies).name: Druidic Focus (Varies)
Druidic Focus (Varies).description:
A Druidic Focus takes one of the forms in the Druidic Focuses table and is carved, tied with ribbon, or painted to channel primal magic. A Druid or Ranger can use such an object as a Spellcasting Focus.

Druidic Focuses
FocusWeightCost
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbdfcSprigofmis]{Sprig of mistletoe}—1 GP
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbdfcWoodenstaf]{Wooden staff} (also a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepQuartersta]{Quarterstaff})4 lb.5 GP
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbdfcYewwand000]{Yew wand}1 lb.10 GP

Dungeoneer's Pack.name: Dungeoneer's Pack
Dungeoneer's Pack.description: A Dungeoneer’s Pack contains the following items: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBackpack000]{Backpack}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCaltrops000]{Caltrops}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCrowbar0000]{Crowbar}, 2 flasks of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000]{Oil}, 10 days of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRations0000]{Rations}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRope0000000]{Rope}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00]{Tinderbox}, 10 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTorch000000]{Torches}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagWaterskin00]{Waterskin}.

Entertainer's Pack.name: Entertainer's Pack
Entertainer's Pack.description: An Entertainer’s Pack contains the following items: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBackpack000]{Backpack}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBedroll0000]{Bedroll}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBell0000000]{Bell}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.UkWdyJYQTfVX2cJW]{Bullseye Lantern}, 3 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCostume0000]{Costumes}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagMirror00000]{Mirror}, 8 flasks of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000]{Oil}, 9 days of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRations0000]{Rations}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00]{Tinderbox}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagWaterskin00]{Waterskin}.

Explorer's Pack.name: Explorer's Pack
Explorer's Pack.description: An Explorer’s Pack contains the following items: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBackpack000]{Backpack}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBedroll0000]{Bedroll}, 2 flasks of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000]{Oil}, 10 days of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRations0000]{Rations}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRope0000000]{Rope}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00]{Tinderbox}, 10 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTorch000000]{Torches}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagWaterskin00]{Waterskin}.

Grappling Hook.name: Grappling Hook
Grappling Hook.description: As a Utilize action, you can throw the Grappling Hook at a railing, a ledge, or another catch within 50 feet of yourself, and the hook catches on if you succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity (Acrobatics) check. If you tied a Rope to the hook, you can then climb it.

Healer's Kit.name: Healer's Kit
Healer's Kit.description: A Healer’s Kit has ten uses. As a Utilize action, you can expend one of its uses to stabilize an Unconscious creature that has 0 Hit Points without needing to make a Wisdom (Medicine) check.

Holy Symbol (Varies).name: Holy Symbol (Varies)
Holy Symbol (Varies).description:
A Holy Symbol takes one of the forms in the Holy Symbol table and is bejeweled or painted to channel divine magic. A Cleric or Paladin can use a Holy Symbol as a Spellcasting Focus.

The table indicates whether a Holy Symbol needs to be held, worn, or borne on fabric (such as a tabard or banner) or a Shield.

Holy Symbols
SymbolWeightCost
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbhsyAmuletworn]{Amulet} (worn or held)1 lb.5 GP
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbhsyEmblemborn]{Emblem} (borne on fabric or a Shield)—5 GP
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbhsyReliquaryh]{Reliquary} (held)2 lb.5 GP

Hunting Trap.name: Hunting Trap
Hunting Trap.description: As a Utilize action, you can set a Hunting Trap, which is a sawtooth steel ring that snaps shut when a creature steps on a pressure plate in the center. The trap is affixed by a heavy chain to an immobile object, such as a tree or a spike driven into the ground. A creature that steps on the plate must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 1d4 Piercing damage and have its Speed reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn. Thereafter, until the creature breaks free of the trap, its movement is limited by the length of the chain (typically 3 feet). A creature can use its action to make a DC 13 Strength (Athletics) check, freeing itself or another creature within its reach on a success. Each failed check deals [[/damage 1 type=piercing]] damage to the trapped creature.

Ink Pen.name: Ink Pen
Ink Pen.description: Using Ink, an Ink Pen is used to write or draw.

Ladder.name: Ladder
Ladder.description: A Ladder is 10 feet tall. You must climb to move up or down it.

Lantern, Bullseye.name: Lantern, Bullseye
Lantern, Bullseye.description: A Bullseye Lantern burns Oil as fuel to cast Bright Light in a 60-foot Cone and Dim Light for an additional 60 feet.

Lantern, Hooded.name: Lantern, Hooded
Lantern, Hooded.description: A Hooded Lantern burns Oil as fuel to cast Bright Light in a 30-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 30 feet. As a Bonus Action, you can lower the hood, reducing the light to Dim Light in a 5-foot radius, or raise it again.

Lock.name: Lock
Lock.description: A Lock comes with a key. Without the key, a creature can use @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulThievesToo]{Thieves’ Tools} to pick this Lock with a successful [[/tool thief dex 15]] check.

Magnifying Glass.name: Magnifying Glass
Magnifying Glass.description: A Magnifying Glass grants Advantage on any ability check made to appraise or inspect a highly detailed item. Lighting a fire with a Magnifying Glass requires light as bright as sunlight to focus, tinder to ignite, and about 5 minutes for the fire to ignite.

Manacles.name: Manacles
Manacles.description:
As a Utilize action, you can use Manacles to bind an unwilling Small or Medium creature within 5 feet of yourself that has the &Reference[Grappled], &Reference[Incapacitated], or &Reference[Restrained] condition if you succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check. While bound, a creature has Disadvantage on attack rolls, and the creature is Restrained if the Manacles are attached to a chain or hook that is fixed in place. Escaping the Manacles requires a successful DC 20 Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check as an action. Bursting them requires a successful DC 25 Strength (Athletics) check as an action.

Each set of Manacles comes with a key. Without the key, a creature can use Thieves’ Tools to pick the Manacles’ lock with a successful [[/tool thief dex 15]] check.

Map.name: Map
Map.description: If you consult an accurate Map, you gain a +5 bonus to Wisdom (Survival) checks you make to find your way in the place represented on it.

Net.name: 捕网
Net.description:
When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with throwing a Net. Target a creature you can see within 15 feet of yourself. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 plus your Dexterity modifier and Proficiency Bonus) or have the &Reference[Restrained] condition until it escapes. The target succeeds automatically if it is Huge or larger.

To escape, the target or a creature within 5 feet of it must take an action to make a [[/skill ath 10]] check, freeing the Restrained creature on a success. Destroying the Net (AC 10; 5 HP; Immunity to Bludgeoning, Poison, and Psychic damage) also frees the target, ending the effect.

Paper.name: Paper
Paper.description: One sheet of Paper can hold about 250 handwritten words.

Perfume.name: Perfume
Perfume.description: Perfume comes in a 4-ounce vial. For 1 hour after applying Perfume to yourself, you have Advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks made to influence an Indifferent Humanoid within 5 feet of yourself.

Poison, Basic.name: Poison, Basic
Poison, Basic.description:
As a Bonus Action, you can use a vial of Basic Poison to coat one weapon or up to three pieces of ammunition. A creature that takes Piercing or Slashing damage from the poisoned weapon or ammunition takes an extra 1d4 Poison damage. Once applied, the poison retains potency for 1 minute or until its damage is dealt, whichever comes first.

Foundry Note

This feature includes a roll for the Poison damage.

Pole.name: Pole
Pole.description: A Pole is 10 feet long. You can use it to touch something up to 10 feet away. If you must make a Strength (Athletics) check as part of a High or Long Jump, you can use the Pole to vault, giving yourself Advantage on the check.

Pot, Iron.name: Pot, Iron
Pot, Iron.description: An Iron Pot holds up to 1 gallon.

Potion of Healing.name: Potion of Healing
Potion of Healing.description: This potion is a magic item. As a Bonus Action, you can drink it or administer it to another creature within 5 feet of yourself. The creature that drinks the magical red fluid in this vial regains 2d4 + 2 Hit Points.

Pouch.name: Pouch
Pouch.description: A Pouch holds up to 6 pounds within one-fifth of a cubic foot.

Priest's Pack.name: Priest's Pack
Priest's Pack.description: A Priest’s Pack contains the following items: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBackpack000]{Backpack}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBlanket0000]{Blanket}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagHolyWater00]{Holy Water}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagLamp0000000]{Lamp}, 7 days of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRations0000]{Rations}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRobe0000000]{Robe}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00]{Tinderbox}.

Ram, Portable.name: Ram, Portable
Ram, Portable.description: You can use a Portable Ram to break down doors. When doing so, you gain a +4 bonus to the Strength check. One other character can help you use the ram, giving you Advantage on this check.

Sack.name: Sack
Sack.description: A Sack holds up to 30 pounds within 1 cubic foot.

Scholar's Pack.name: Scholar's Pack
Scholar's Pack.description: A Scholar’s Pack contains the following items: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBackpack000]{Backpack}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBook0000000]{Book}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagInk00000000]{Ink}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagInkPen00000]{Ink Pen}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagLamp0000000]{Lamp}, 10 flasks of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000]{Oil}, 10 sheets of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagParchment00]{Parchment}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00]{Tinderbox}.

Shovel.name: Shovel
Shovel.description: Working for 1 hour, you can use a Shovel to dig a hole that is 5 feet on each side in soil or similar material.

Signal Whistle.name: Signal Whistle
Signal Whistle.description: When blown as a Utilize action, a Signal Whistle produces a sound that can be heard up to 600 feet away.

Spell Scroll, Level 1.name: Spell Scroll, Level 1
Spell Scroll, Level 1.description:
A @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCantripScro]{Spell Scroll (Cantrip)} or Spell Scroll (Level 1) is a magic item that bears the words of a cantrip or level 1 spell, respectively, determined by the scroll’s creator. If the spell is on your class’s spell list, you can read the scroll and cast the spell using its normal casting time and without providing any Material components.

If the spell requires a saving throw or an attack roll, the spell save DC is 13, and the attack bonus is +5. The scroll disintegrates when the casting is completed.

Spikes, Iron.name: Spikes, Iron
Spikes, Iron.description: Iron Spikes come in bundles of ten. As a Utilize action, you can use a blunt object, such as a Light Hammer, to hammer a spike into wood, earth, or a similar material. You can do so to jam a door shut or to then tie a Rope or Chain to the Spike.

Spyglass.name: Spyglass
Spyglass.description: Objects viewed through a Spyglass are magnified to twice their size.

String.name: String
String.description: String is 10 feet long. You can tie a knot in it as a Utilize action.

Tent.name: Tent
Tent.description: A Tent sleeps up to two Small or Medium creatures.

Arrows.name: Arrows
Arrows.description:
Storage: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagQuiver00000]{Quiver}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagAmmunitionV]{Ammunition} is required by a weapon that has the Ammunition property. A weapon’s description specifies the type of ammunition used by the weapon. The Ammunition table lists the different types and the amount you get when you buy them. The table also lists the item that is typically used to store each type; storage must be bought separately.

Bolts.name: Bolts
Bolts.description:
Storage: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCaseCrossbo]{Case}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagAmmunitionV]{Ammunition} is required by a weapon that has the Ammunition property. A weapon’s description specifies the type of ammunition used by the weapon. The Ammunition table lists the different types and the amount you get when you buy them. The table also lists the item that is typically used to store each type; storage must be bought separately.

The table also lists the item that is typically used to store each type; storage must be bought separately.

A weapon’s description specifies the type of ammunition used by the weapon. The Ammunition table lists the different types and the amount you get when you buy them. The table also lists the item that is typically used to store each type; storage must be bought separately.

Needles.name: Needles
Needles.description:

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagAmmunitionV]{Ammunition} is required by a weapon that has the Ammunition property. A weapon’s description specifies the type of ammunition used by the weapon. The Ammunition table lists the different types and the amount you get when you buy them. The table also lists the item that is typically used to store each type; storage must be bought separately.

Shield.name: 盾牌
Shield.description: You gain the Armor Class benefit of a Shield only if you have training with it.

Sprig of mistletoe.name: Sprig of mistletoe
Sprig of mistletoe.description: A @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagDruidicFocu]{Druidic Focus} takes one of the forms in the Druidic Focuses table and is carved, tied with ribbon, or painted to channel primal magic. A Druid or Ranger can use such an object as a Spellcasting Focus.

Wooden staff.name: Wooden staff
Wooden staff.description:
A @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagDruidicFocu]{Druidic Focus} takes one of the forms in the Druidic Focuses table and is carved, tied with ribbon, or painted to channel primal magic. A Druid or Ranger can use such an object as a Spellcasting Focus.

This item also functions as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepQuartersta]{Quarterstaff}

Foundry Note

This item has been configured with the additional properties of a Quarterstaff.

Yew wand.name: Yew wand
Yew wand.description: A @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagDruidicFocu]{Druidic Focus} takes one of the forms in the Druidic Focuses table and is carved, tied with ribbon, or painted to channel primal magic. A Druid or Ranger can use such an object as a Spellcasting Focus.

Dice.name: Dice
Dice.description:
Ability: Wisdom

Utilize: Discern whether someone is cheating (DC 10), or win the game (DC 20)

Dragonchess.name: Dragonchess
Dragonchess.description:
Ability: Wisdom

Utilize: Discern whether someone is cheating (DC 10), or win the game (DC 20)

Playing Cards.name: Playing Cards
Playing Cards.description:
Ability: Wisdom

Utilize: Discern whether someone is cheating (DC 10), or win the game (DC 20)

Three-dragon ante.name: Three-dragon ante
Three-dragon ante.description:
Ability: Wisdom

Utilize: Discern whether someone is cheating (DC 10), or win the game (DC 20)

Amulet.name: Amulet
Amulet.description:
Usage Requirement: Worn or held

A @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagHolySymbolV]{Holy Symbol} takes one of the forms in the Holy Symbol table and is bejeweled or painted to channel divine magic. A Cleric or Paladin can use a Holy Symbol as a Spellcasting Focus.

Emblem.name: Emblem
Emblem.description:
Usage Requirement: Borne on fabric or a Shield

A @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagHolySymbolV]{Holy Symbol} takes one of the forms in the Holy Symbol table and is bejeweled or painted to channel divine magic. A Cleric or Paladin can use a Holy Symbol as a Spellcasting Focus.

Reliquary.name: Reliquary
Reliquary.description:
Usage Requirement: Held

A @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagHolySymbolV]{Holy Symbol} takes one of the forms in the Holy Symbol table and is bejeweled or painted to channel divine magic. A Cleric or Paladin can use a Holy Symbol as a Spellcasting Focus.

Bagpipes.name: 风笛
Bagpipes.description:
Ability: Charisma

Utilize: Play a known tune (DC 10), or improvise a song (DC 15)

Drum.name: 鼓
Drum.description:

Viol.description:

Alchemist's Supplies.name: 炼金工具
Alchemist's Supplies.description:
Ability: Intelligence

Utilize: Identify a substance (DC 15), or start a fire (DC 15)

Craft: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagAcid0000000]{Acid}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagAlchemistsF]{Alchemist’s Fire}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagComponentPo]{Component Pouch}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000]{Oil}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPaper000000]{Paper}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPerfume0000]{Perfume}

Brewer's Supplies.name: 酿酒工具
Brewer's Supplies.description:
Ability: Intelligence

Utilize: Detect poisoned drink (DC 15), or identify alcohol (DC 10)

Craft: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagAntitoxin00]{Antitoxin}

Calligrapher's Supplies.name: 书法工具
Calligrapher's Supplies.description:
Ability: Dexterity

Utilize: Write text with impressive flourishes that guard against forgery (DC 15)

Craft: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagInk00000000]{Ink}, Spell Scroll

Carpenter's Tools.name: 木匠工具
Carpenter's Tools.description:
Ability: Strength

Utilize: Seal or pry open a door or container (DC 20)

Craft: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepClub000000]{Club}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreatclub0]{Greatclub}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepQuartersta]{Quarterstaff}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBarrel00000]{Barrel}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagChest000000]{Chest}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagLadder00000]{Ladder}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPole0000000]{Pole}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.srTRzwTfWKO5opOo]{Portable Ram}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTorch000000]{Torch}

Cartographer's Tools.name: 制图工具
Cartographer's Tools.description:
Ability: Wisdom

Utilize: Draft a map of a small area (DC 15)

Craft: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagMap00000000]{Map}

Cobbler's Tools.name: 鞋匠工具
Cobbler's Tools.description:
Ability: Dexterity

Utilize: Modify footwear to give Advantage on the wearer’s next Dexterity (Acrobatics) check (DC 10)

Craft: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagClimbersKit]{Climber’s Kit}

Cook's Utensils.name: 厨师工具
Cook's Utensils.description:
Ability: Wisdom

Utilize: Improve food’s flavor (DC 10), or detect spoiled or poisoned food (DC 15)

Craft: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRations0000]{Rations}

Forgery Kit.name: 文书伪造工具
Forgery Kit.description:
Ability: Dexterity

Utilize: Mimic 10 or fewer words of someone else’s handwriting (DC 15), or duplicate a wax seal (DC 20)

Glassblower's Tools.name: 玻璃匠工具
Glassblower's Tools.description:
Ability: Intelligence

Utilize: Discern what a glass object held in the past 24 hours (DC 15)

Craft: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.HZp69hhyNZUUCipF]{Glass Bottle}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagMagnifyingG]{Magnifying Glass}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagSpyglass100]{Spyglass}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagVial0000000]{Vial}

Herbalism Kit.name: 草药工具
Herbalism Kit.description:
Ability: Intelligence

Utilize: Identify a plant (DC 10)

Craft: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagAntitoxin00]{Antitoxin}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCandle00000]{Candle}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagHealersKit0]{Healer’s Kit}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPotionofHea]{Potion of Healing}

Jeweler's Tools.name: 珠宝匠工具
Jeweler's Tools.description:
Ability: Intelligence

Utilize: Discern a gem’s value (DC 15)

Craft: Arcane Focus, Holy Symbol

Leatherworker's Tools.name: 皮匠工具
Leatherworker's Tools.description:
Ability: Dexterity

Utilize: Add a design to a leather item (DC 10)

Craft: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepSling00000]{Sling}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepWhip000000]{Whip}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmHideArmor0]{Hide Armor}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmLeatherArm]{Leather Armor}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmStuddedLea]{Studded Leather Armor}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBackpack000]{Backpack}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.eJtPBiZtr2pp6ynt]{Crossbow Bolt Case}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCaseMaporSc]{Map or Scroll Case}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagParchment00]{Parchment}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPouch000000]{Pouch}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagQuiver00000]{Quiver}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagWaterskin00]{Waterskin}

Mason's Tools.name: 石匠工具
Mason's Tools.description:
Ability: Strength

Utilize: Chisel a symbol or hole in stone (DC 10)

Craft: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBlockandTac]{Block and Tackle}

Navigator's Tools.name: 领航工具
Navigator's Tools.description:
Ability: Wisdom

Utilize: Plot a course (DC 10), or determine position by stargazing (DC 15)

Painter's Supplies.name: 画家工具
Painter's Supplies.description:
Ability: Wisdom

Utilize: Paint a recognizable image of something you’ve seen (DC 10)

Craft: Druidic Focus, Holy Symbol

Poisoner's Kit.name: 制毒工具
Poisoner's Kit.description:
Ability: Intelligence

Utilize: Detect a poisoned object (DC 10)

Craft: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPoisonBasic]{Basic Poison}

Potter's Tools.name: 陶匠工具
Potter's Tools.description:
Ability: Intelligence Weight: 3 lb.

Utilize: Discern what a ceramic object held in the past 24 hours (DC 15)

Craft: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagJug00000000]{Jug}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagLamp0000000]{Lamp}

Smith's Tools.name: 铁匠工具
Smith's Tools.description:
Ability: Strength

Utilize: Pry open a door or container (DC 20)

Craft: Any Melee weapon (except Club, Greatclub, Quarterstaff, and Whip), Medium armor (except Hide), Heavy armor, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBallBearing]{Ball Bearings}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBucket00000]{Bucket}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCaltrops000]{Caltrops}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagChain000000]{Chain}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCrowbar0000]{Crowbar}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbamoBulletsFir]{Firearm Bullets}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagGrapplingHo]{Grappling Hook}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.M8xM8BLK4tpUayEE]{Iron Pot}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagSpikesIron0]{Iron Spikes}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbamoBulletsSli]{Sling Bullets}

Thieves' Tools.name: 盗贼工具
Thieves' Tools.description:
Ability: Dexterity

Utilize: Pick a lock (DC 15), or disarm a trap (DC 15)

Tinker's Tools.name: 修补工具
Tinker's Tools.description:
Ability: Dexterity

Utilize: Assemble a Tiny item composed of scrap, which falls apart in 1 minute (DC 20)

Craft: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepMusket0000]{Musket}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepPistol0000]{Pistol}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBell0000000]{Bell}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.UkWdyJYQTfVX2cJW]{Bullseye Lantern}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagFlask000000]{Flask}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.wjHtGnd05SPdURqE]{Hooded Lantern}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagHuntingTrap]{Hunting Trap}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagLock0000000]{Lock}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagManacles000]{Manacles}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagMirror00000]{Mirror}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagShovel00000]{Shovel}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagSignalWhist]{Signal Whistle}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00]{Tinderbox}

Weaver's Tools.name: 织布工具
Weaver's Tools.description:
Ability: Dexterity

Utilize: Mend a tear in clothing (DC 10), or sew a Tiny design (DC 10)
